title: velocyto_to_h5mu
description:
Convert a velocyto loom file to a h5mu file.

If an input h5mu file is also provided, the velocity
h5ad object will get added to that h5mu instead.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input_loom.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.loom`. Path to the input loom file
input_loom.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.loom`. Path to the input loom file.

input_h5mu.description: Type: `file`, example: `input.h5mu`. If a MuData file is provided,
input_h5mu.help_text: Type: `file`, example: `input.h5mu`. If a MuData file is provided,

modality.description: Type: `string`, default: `rna_velocity`. The name of the modality to operate on
modality.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `rna_velocity`. The name of the modality to operate on.

output.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. Path to the output MuData file
output.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. Path to the output MuData file.

output_compression.description: Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression format to be used on the output h5mu object
output_compression.help_text: Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression format to be used on the output h5mu object.

layer_spliced.description: Type: `string`, default: `velo_spliced`. Output layer for the spliced reads
layer_spliced.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `velo_spliced`. Output layer for the spliced reads.

layer_unspliced.description: Type: `string`, default: `velo_unspliced`. Output layer for the unspliced reads
layer_unspliced.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `velo_unspliced`. Output layer for the unspliced reads.

layer_ambiguous.description: Type: `string`, default: `velo_ambiguous`. Output layer for the ambiguous reads
layer_ambiguous.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `velo_ambiguous`. Output layer for the ambiguous reads.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
